recipes.title: Hazelnut Coffee
recipes.instructions: Directions                                                                                In a large saucepan, combine the coffee, flavoring syrup, sugar and cinnamon; heat through. Divide coffee mixture among four mugs.                                                                                           In a small bowl, beat cream and Nutella until thickened. Gently spoon onto tops of drinks. Serve immediately.                                        Yield: 4 servings.                                                                                                     Editor's Note: This recipe was tested with Torani brand flavoring syrup. Look for it in the coffee section.                                                                                                Originally published as Hazelnut Coffee in  Taste of Home Christmas AnnualAnnual 2011, p71                                                                                                                                                                                                        Nutritional Facts                                                                             1 serving equals 129 calories, 7 g fat (4 g saturated fat), 20 mg cholesterol, 12 mg sodium, 16 g carbohydrate, trace fiber, 1 g protein.
